lyrics.text: I will rebel against the status quo
I won't stay up nights in your love
And it's impossible that I might think of returning to you
And in your absence my life will be sweet

And tries to fool its deluded feelings
Now you have deceived it and it understands
And I will not believe my imagination anymore
Passions and the world are there before me
And I will never be able to forget you for one second
that hold the promised happiness for me
